ai:opt_in_level_disabled.description: Enable the AI opt in level 'disabled'

ai:opt_in_level_schema.description: Enable the AI opt in level 'schema'

ai:opt_in_level_schema_and_log.description: Enable the AI opt in level 'schema_and_log'

ai:opt_in_level_schema_and_log_and_data.description: Enable the AI opt in level 'schema_and_log_and_data'

authentication:sign_in_providers.description: Enable the authentication sign in / providers page

authentication:third_party_auth.description: Enable the authentication third party auth page

authentication:rate_limits.description: Enable the authentication rate limits page

authentication:multi_factor.description: Enable the authentication multi factor page

authentication:attack_protection.description: Enable the authentication attack protection page

authentication:show_providers.description: Show the providers section in the authentication Sign In / Providers page

authentication:show_manual_linking.description: Show the manual linking toggle in the authentication Sign In / Providers page under User Signups

authentication:show_send_invitation.description: Show the send invitation option in the authentication users page

authentication:show_provider_filter.description: Show the provider filter in the authentication users page

authentication:show_sort_by_email.description: Show the sort by email option in the authentication users page

authentication:show_sort_by_phone.description: Show the sort by phone option in the authentication users page

authentication:show_user_type_filter.description: Show the user type filter in the authentication users page

dashboard_auth:sign_up.description: Enable the sign up page in the dashboard

dashboard_auth:sign_in_with_github.description: Enable the sign in with github provider

dashboard_auth:sign_in_with_sso.description: Enable the sign in with sso provider

dashboard_auth:sign_in_with_email.description: Enable the sign in with email/password provider

dashboard_auth:show_testimonial.description: Enable the testimonial on the sign in/up page

feedback:docs.description: Enable feedback submission for docs site

integrations:vercel.description: Enable the vercel integration section in the organization and project settings pages

integrations:show_stripe_wrapper.description: Show the Stripe wrapper under project integrations

organization:show_sso_settings.description: Show the SSO settings tab in the organization settings page

profile:show_email.description: Show the user's email address in the toolbar

profile:show_information.description: Shows the user's profile information (first name, last name) in account preferences

profile:show_analytics_and_marketing.description: Shows the analytics and marketing section in account preferences

profile:show_account_deletion.description: Shows the account deletion section in account preferences

project_connection:javascript_example.description: Show the javascript example in the project connection settings. If off, it'll show up as Typescript example instead (both are the same code example)

project_connection:dart_example.description: Show the dart example in the project connection settings

project_connection:show_app_frameworks.description: Show the app frameworks tab in the connect modal

project_connection:show_mobile_framework.description: Show the mobile frameworks tab in the connect modal

project_connection:show_orms.description: Show the orms tab in the connect modal

project_creation:show_advanced_config.description: Show the advanced configuration option in the project creation flow

project_homepage:show_instance_size.description: Show the instance size badge in the project homepage and infrastructure settings

project_homepage:show_examples.description: Show the example projects in the project homepage

project_addons:dedicated_ipv4_address.description: Show the dedicated IPv4 address addon

project_addons:show_compute_price.description: Show the compute price in the compute and disk page

project_settings:custom_domains.description: Show the custom domain configuration section + custom domain addon

project_settings:show_disable_legacy_api.description: Show the disable legacy API keys section in project settings API Keys page

project_settings:legacy_jwt_keys.description: Enable the legacy JWT secret page in project settings

project_settings:log_drains.description: Enable the log drains page in project settings
